question: Please analyze this URL https://www.helloelife.com/
thought: I need to check the content of the given URL to determine if it is a scam website or not. The website is accessible, now I need to extract the text and hyperlinks to analyze the content. The website contains unusually low prices and claims of free, which is a characteristic of a scam website. I need to check if there are any other characteristics present. The website does not have any additional characteristics of a scam website. It only contains unusually low prices and claims of free, which is a characteristic of a scam website. Based on this analysis, the website https://www.helloelife.com/ is determined to be a scam website. {

answer.reason: The website contains unusually low prices and claims of free which is a characteristic of a scam website.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
